OOC: From now on, I control Shokaract, Alloran has given him to me, so now =
I have compelte control of him. I'd like to give a public thank you to Allo=
ran for giving me this great character, thank you Alloran. Shokaract's last=
 location was out there somewhere heading towards the Cybertronian Fire.

B=
IC: Shokaract looked at the Cybertronian Fire from afar. He would like to a=
ttack it now, but he knew how very little power the Matrix of Conquest had =
consumed. He needed some loyal followers to help him, then he could easily =
destroy all sides and rule the Neo Beast Wars. He decided now was better th=
an later and decided to find some soldiers to do battle for him. He would p=
ersuade Maximals and Predacons alike to join him, then the real carnage wou=
ld begin. He thought about who would be best to make a friendly deal with, =
some team to assist his team. Who would be better than the Alliance? He scu=
rried in beast mode towards the Alliance base...
